lead_paragraph: European soccer's governing body UEFA is paying "special attention" to the Russian team for potential drug violations during the month-long Euro 2016 tournament, the head of UEFA's anti-doping arm said on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: UEFA Keeps Close Eye on Russian Team After Doping Scandal
headline.main: UEFA Keeps Close Eye on Russian Team After Doping Scandal

snippet: European soccer's governing body UEFA is paying "special attention" to the Russian team for potential drug violations during the month-long Euro 2016 tournament, the head of UEFA's anti-doping arm said on Tuesday....
